Entry.JapaneseText: ねえねえ、<Yellow>羽のフォルス<White>が暴走したら、 みんなフワフワしちゃうのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: Y'know, if the <Yellow>Force of Feathers<White> were to go berserk, would we all start floating?

Entry.JapaneseText: フワフワしたら、 けっこう楽しくねえか？
Entry.EnglishText: Wouldn't it be fun if we were all floating?

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、ご飯を食べる時に体が フワフワしちゃったら、食べにくくない？
Entry.EnglishText: But wouldn't it be hard to eat if your body was floating?

Entry.JapaneseText: おお！ じゃあ、料理も作りにくいよな！ ヤバイぜ、こりゃ！
Entry.EnglishText: Oh! Well, then it would be hard to cook too! That would be awful!

Entry.JapaneseText: 料理だけじゃないよ！ お風呂とかどうするんだろ!?
Entry.EnglishText: Not just that! How would you go about taking a bath?!

Entry.JapaneseText: いやいや、それだけじゃないぞ！ あれもこれも……ああっ、大変だ！
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, yeah, not just that! All sorts of things... Agh, it would be a disaster!

Entry.JapaneseText: はぁ……一生、やってなさい……
Entry.EnglishText: Ugh... If you want to keep this up, be my guest.
